```{r}
# 1. 
install.packages("readxl")
library(readxl)

file_path <- "DataFrame.xlsx"
df <- read_excel(file_path)
df

# 1.b
male_subset <- subset(df, Gender == "M")
female_subset <- subset(df, Gender == "F")

print("Male Subset:")
print(male_subset)

print("Female Subset:")
print(female_subset)

# 1.c
mean_shoe_size <- mean(df$ShoeSize, na.rm = TRUE)
mean_height <- mean(df$Height, na.rm = TRUE)

print(paste("Mean Shoe Size:", mean_shoe_size))
print(paste("Mean Height:", mean_height))

# 1.d
correlation <- cor(df$ShoeSize, df$Height, use = "complete.obs")

print(paste("Correlation between Shoe Size and Height:", correlation))
```
